publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-8204 Sarah Boyack: The Resignation of the Independent Chair of the Fuel Poverty Forum—That the Parliament notes with regret the decision by the independent chair of the Scottish Fuel Poverty Forum to resign his position; notes the chair’s reported comments that the forum has felt "disabled" and impeded in fulfilling its remits of monitoring the Energy Assistance Package and Home Insulation Scheme and advising ministers on fuel poverty issues, and calls on the Scottish Government to appoint a new independent chair and meet the members of the Scottish Fuel Poverty Forum as a matter of urgency.
